entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lansdowne House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:38 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -30.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lansdowne House Airport 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -30.2°C
Pressure: 103.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -34.8°C
Wind: W 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
